patthana16.80:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.80:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
